column1: # Factions on this list will not have their weapons for sale/order by the structure.
# Custom order for a friendly entity would be supported by even the most hostile factions - so only extremely reclusive factions should be on this list
# If your faction has an open, unregulated market it sells weapons on, there is no reason to blacklist it here
#In-campaign toggle: Set !!faction!! memory key "$IndEvo_customOrderAllowed". True = allowed (even if on this list), false = prohbited (even if not on this list).
